title: Create gpt-oss-agent crate with tool handling
description:
Implement the agent-level wrapper for GPT-OSS as specified in d-019 Phase 4.

Tasks:
1. Create crates/gpt-oss-agent/ crate structure
2. Implement agent session management
3. Add browser tool support (native Rust implementation)
4. Add python tool support (Docker-based sandbox)
5. Add apply_patch tool support
6. Integrate with acp-adapter pattern
7. Add trajectory recording support
